name: Pour-over
tagline: Lance Hendrick's recommended technique for making delicious pour-over coffee.

steps.description: Pour in {{ target }} ml at a constant rate of 7 gr/s
Agitate the grounds with a spoon and bloom
Pour at a constant rate of 7 gr/s until you reach {{ target }} ml
If draining slowly, swirl. If draining quickly, agitate
If not done by now, agitate less or grind coarser
